downloadTitle: Workshop: Plan, Deliver, & Operate Microsoft Teams
downloadDescription: PowerPoint deck to lead a planning workshop for Microsoft Teams deployment
detailsSection: Use this PowerPoint deck to lead a workshop with your organization to plan your Microsoft Teams rollout. The workshop introduces Teams and guides your team through decision points and next steps.
systemRequirementsSection:
• The file is a Microsoft PowerPoint file. Users who do not have Microsoft PowerPoint can view this document through the downloadable PowerPoint Viewer.
    •
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
    2.  
  2. Do one of the following:
    3.  
       
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
      •  
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
      •
